subject: Tests and Testing
Track and Field
Olympic Games
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: All of Marion Jones’s results dating to September 2000 were annulled because of “her admission that she was using the prohibited substance known as ‘the clear.’ ”
snippet: All of Marion Jones’s results dating to September 2000 were annulled because of “her admission that she was using the prohibited substance known as ‘the clear.’ ”
